title: anyone help!!!
body:
hello guys i have a problem in league of legends (PBE) i cant run it because give me error RADS 
pic 
http://prntscr.com/fjckzt 
if anyone can help me  dnot be Stingy

replies.body: I might be able to help, though I'm a bit more sassy than stingy.  :D  Depending on where you have this saved, your OS settings might be blocking your game files from being accessed.  You should be able to resolve this by going through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  This will make sure your PBE files are added as an exception.  I hope that helps!

my game files save in desktop
  or C and just cant download the game because cant open and i close my firewall  so 
your solution didn't  work! thanks
